summary: He is a God among Argonians he is a genetically altered Argonian spliced with pure dragon blood to be the ultimate warrior and he will follow you to the depths of hell. (caution: if you don't like a follower that's stronger than you or that kills enemies with nearly one blow  or takes your kills do not download)
descriptionHtml: This is just a simple follower mod that adds a character to the game. you can find the character in Jorrvaskr usually hanging out inside or outside in the training area, simply approach the NPC and press the "speak" action than use the "follow me. i need your help" order from the dialogue menu and your set to go! *NOTE: if you have the amazing follower tweak mod installed and use the spell on him it may cause some bug issues (ect: never attacks, pulls out weapon, weapon stays in his right hand and is never sheathed or used, and never leaves your side even when "its time for us to part ways" command is used.
author: ggarciausmc
